casebody.data:
Craig Franklin SMITH
v.
NORTH CAROLINA BOARD OF FUNERAL SERVICE No. 331A18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Abraham P. Jones, Attorney at Law, For Smith, Craig Franklin. Jackson Nichols, Catherine E. Lee, Leah Hermiller, Attorneys at Law, For North Carolina Board of Funeral Service.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the notice of appeal from the North Carolina Court of Appeals, filed by the Petitioner on the 2nd of October 2018 in this matter pursuant to G.S. 7A-30, and the motion to dismiss the appeal for lack of substantial constitutional question filed by the Respondent, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals: the motion to dismiss the appeal is

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."
